body.name: KAVVO Oyster Mini 38mm Bluetooth Smartwatch for Women, 1.1'' Delicate AMOLED Always-On Display, Rotating Bezel, Fitness Tracker with Female Health, Heart Rate Blood Oxygen Monitor(Ceramic White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 15 mins
features: ［World's Smallest AMOLED Smart Watch with Rotating Bezel］ With KAVVO Mini’s 38mm dimension, you could experience unparalleled clarity in the most compact AMOLED smartwatch, and it applies BOE AMOLED retina in its screen. Meanwhile, It only weighs 36g so that you will have a totally comfortable wearing experience.

［A SMART WATCH WITH CLASSIC STYLE］The KAVVO Oyster Mini draws inspiration from the design of Chanel J12 watches. It inherits ideas such as mechanical unidirectional rotating bezel, and its SUS316 Stainless Steel Chronography Bezel offers an elegant look.

［Tailored for Women/Reloj Inteligente Para Mujer］ Equipped with advanced female health tracking, this watch could help record the last date, menstrual duration, cycle duration of menstrual period. Moreover, record of pressure and mood are also feasible so that you could have better control over your emotions.

［100+ Sports Modes and Health Monitor］ As your fitness manager, KAVVO Mini provides 100+ sports modes, you can find almost every common sport mode and record the condition when you exercise. With this device, you are also allowed to monitor your heart rate and blood oxygen.

［IOS and Android Compatible with Long Battery Life］The product is available for iphone and android phones. After connected with the phone’s bluetooth, you can use it to receive and make calls, check notifications and enjoy other functions such as voice assistant. Its battery lasts 10 days with normal use and 15 days with light use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specializing in Female Health As a product for women, KAVVO OYSTER Mini has a variety of records for our female customers on menstruation. You are able to record the last date of your period, the menstrual duration and cycle duration. And these records will help observe your own health status in time. Mental Health Is Equally Important Not only will you be able to record basic but important metrics like heart rate, blood oxygen, you can also take care of your mental health with functions such as pressure record, mood record, sleep duration record. Your mental health is just as important as your physical health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yay! I love it!
reviews.reviewText: Pretty excited that 1- I have a smart watch and 2- I set it up myself lol.This is a really nice looking piece, love the traditional face it has but also that I can switch it up for holidays etc. I am far from tech savvy but I downloaded the app and synched it, changed a couple settings, added a few notifications I would like on… all by myself in just a few minutes!!!! lol.I finally decided to get one of these because many of my coworkers have them, seems nice to not have to carry my phone always but get notifications I might need right away. I’m in the beginning of making a big changes for my health and I am excited to use those features of the watch to encourage me… it even has a reminder you can set if you are sitting still too long it reminds you to get up and move.Highly recommend, if I can figure it out you probably can too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a beautiful watch but it is difficult to pull up apps. I ended up wearing it just for the watch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic smart watch
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife for Christmas and she loves it. The design is elegant. Initial setup was easy and straightforward. Battery life is very good.The watch feels very premium and well build. The UI is very easy to use and screen is high def. A week of usage, only praise and no complaints from the wife so far. Definitely feel like a $400-500 watch for a friction of the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars App wouldn’t work
reviews.reviewText: I really like how this watch looks and feels. Packaging was high end feeling. That being said I couldn’t get the app on my iPhone. It kept telling me it was corrupted and couldn’t be downloaded. This lead to me not being able to do anything with the watch as I can’t get past the pairing screen. It is a gorgeous watch and feels very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Promising new smartwatch , needs some work (and users guide)
reviews.reviewText: The only smartwatch I have ever owned is a Fitbit Inspire, which I use for time and tracking steps only. When I saw this on Amazon I was shocked at how beautiful it was for the price! This watch has a large face, and fits on my small wrist wonderfully without overwhelming me. It is a very elegant looking watch, with small details that set it apart from other smartwatches I have seen.This comes absolutely beautifully packaged, and I wish I could find the watch face that is on the box, as it is stunning! It is relatively easy to set up and pair, although the instructions that come with this are sorely lacking. It's basically a fold out quick guide, that shows you what app to install, how to power on/off, how to use the button, touch screen and bezel. The quick start guide is also in 15 languages other than English.The app that accompanies this is sorely lacking, but that is another review for another place. I carefully read the User and Privacy agreement since this is such a new company and was surprised at how detailed it is. There are many areas that need work on the app, but it does work somewhat with the watch, and is not a battery hog. I do wish that there was at least a Users guide on the app, since only the basic information is included in the box. There is a place on the app where you can contact them for feedback, which I did, and never heard back from them. The last time the app was updated was 9.27.23, so it appears the watch and app were put out, but no updates have been done.The smartwatch itself is nice. It keeps time well. The alarm is an annoying song, but easy to set up right from the watch. The step count is off significantly with my Fitbit (1-3000 steps daily), but I had the same problem when I used the Amazon Halo watch. The notifications work, but I turned them off once I realized that I was receiving notifications on everything (including email), even though I only ticked the boxes for messages and phone. The weather info doesn't work at all, and since there is no users guide, I have no idea how to get it to work. The flashlight is bright enough to get me through a dark room without stubbing my toe. There are numerous other features on this watch that are probably really nice, but I have no idea how they work, because there is no users guide.The price point on this is really good for a watch this beautiful, but without some kind of more detailed information on how it works/what it is capable of doing, it just becomes a beautiful expensive watch. I am not certain I would purchase again until/unless the bugs are worked out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift I ended up keeping. It charged really quick with a cool pin magnetic cord. It’s lite and paired easily. Wrist band is easy to attach and strap on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful useless smartwatch
reviews.reviewText: It's beautiful and has great faces to download but the app crashes constantly and had to be uninstalled making the health tracker useless. It also vibrates for almost ten seconds with every notification and you can't change that. If the app was improved and the vibration was handled it would be fantastic. But as is, it's just a pretty watch that's overpriced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars simple and very classy
reviews.reviewText: this smart watcg is a very good looking woman's watch. The white and silver colors look great with the white watch face. I really like the interface, as it lends itself nicely to someone who is getting a smartwatch for the first time. the size is great for smaller wrists, and isnt overly bulky like many smart watches ive seen on the market today. it also has many of the features would expect on a smartwatch todThe one con i can think of for this watch is that it may be a little too fancy for everyday use. Especially if you wear more sporty or casual clothing day to day. However, if you say work in an office, or are just dressed more formally day to day, then i would definitely recommend this watch if you like the look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a smart watch that didn't look like the normal fitness watch, so I brought the Oyster mini! It's a lovely design and very comfortable to wear. The battery seems to last well and it charges very quickly. I really like the sleep monitoring and how easy the watch is to use. The BP and oxygen is also a great feature. The actual watch face and the light is very bright too. Would 100% recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: The smartwatch is available in different colors such as rose gold!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This smartwatch features a 1.1'' delicate AMOLED always-on display, a rotating bezel, and functions as a fitness tracker with female health, heart rate, and blood oxygen monitoring capabilities. It is designed to cater to the specific needs of women, including advanced female health tracking features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wife loves it and enjoys wearing it .it looks nice on wrist and does everything she wants .
